Psychic Terrain:MP Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of restoring one MP of the move used if the move is successful.
Psychic Terrain:Pep Rally 1- Raises the Speed of all allied sync pairs when a move is successful.
Psychic Terrain:Team Hit and Heal- Makes all allied sync pairs gradually heal themselves when a move is successful.
You Snooze, You Lose!:MP Refresh 2- Has a moderate chance of restoring one MP of the move used if the move is successful.
Unfortuitous 3- Has a moderately good chance of lowering the target’s Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, Speed, accuracy or evasiveness at random when an attack is successful.
Precognition 2- Quickly charges the move gauge when the field is Psychic Terrain.
Brainteaser- The more the target’s Sp. Def has been lowered, the more it powers up moves.
Weird Recovery 1- Restores the Pokémon’s HP whenever it takes an action when the field is Psychic Terrain.
Mutually Assured- Whenever the user becomes poisoned, badly poisoned, paralyzed, or burned from an opponent’s move, the same status condition is also applied to that opponent.
Lucky Entry 2- Sharply raises the user’s Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, Speed, accuracy, or evasiveness at random when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Weird Shield- Sp. Def increases 50% when the field is Psychic Terrain.

grid.bonus: X Speed:MP Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of restoring one MP of the move used if the move is successful.
Swift:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
A World of Dreams!:MP Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of restoring one MP of the move used if the move is successful.
Hostile Environment 1- Raises the chance of inflicting status conditions with the additional effects of moves.
First Aid 4- Restores a bit of the Pokémon’s HP once during battle when the Pokémon is in a pinch.
Weather Surge 3- Powers up moves when weather conditions are in effect.
Agile Entry 2- Sharply raises the user’s evasiveness when the Pokémon enters a battle.
Special Reserves 2- Once per battle, sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk when in a pinch.
Dirty Fighting 3- Powers up moves when the move’s target or targets are affected by a status condition.
Inertia- The higher the user’s Speed, the more it powers up sync moves.
Blind Spot- The more the user’s evasiveness has been raised, the more it powers up sync moves.
Natural Remedy- Once per battle, removes all status conditions from the user when the user is inflicted by any status condition.
Shifty Striker 2- Has a moderate chance of raising the user’s evasiveness when the user’s Pokémon uses a move.

moves.name: Obstruct
moves.effect: The user takes up a defensive posture. Using this move again will make the user leave this defensive posture. No other actions can be taken when in this defensive posture. Nullifies an attack move that targets the user while it is in this defensive posture, then the user leaves the defensive posture. If the move was a physical attack move, sharply lowers the Defense of the opponent that used it.

Night Slash:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Obstruct:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.

Obstruct:MP Refresh 2- Has a moderate chance of restoring one MP of the move used if the move is successful.
Shout My Name!:MP Refresh 3- Has a moderately good chance of restoring one MP of the move used if the move is successful.
Stalwart- Sp. Def cannot be lowered.
On the Ropes 3- Reduces damage when the Pokémon is in a pinch and is hit by a physical attack move.
Gritty 5- Powers up moves if the Pokémon is affected by a status condition.
Power Reserves 3- Powers up moves in a pinch.
Critical Strike 1- Powers up attacks if they become critical hits.
Outrun 3- Quickly charges the move gauge when the Pokémon is affected by a status condition.
Unyielding 3- When the user has endured the most recent hit and has 1 HP remaining, has a moderately good chance of allowing the user to endure an additional hit that would reduce it to 0 HP.
Block and Heal 1- Has a small chance of restoring the user’s HP when the user nullifies an opponent’s move while in a defensive posture.
Block and Lunge 1- Has a small chance of reducing the user’s sync move countdown by one when the user nullifies an opponent’s move while in a defensive posture.

moves.name: Avalanche
moves.effect: The user takes up a counterattacking posture. Using this move again will cause the user to attack, then leave this posture. No other actions can be taken while in this posture. If hit by an attack move while in this counterattacking posture, the user attacks the target with double that power, then the user leaves this posture.
